name: Firework Apprentice
description:
Dive into the fantastic world of floating islands and help young Firework Apprentice get to the Emperor's Palace for the annual firework contest.

Solve puzzles, help encountered characters, run for your life, collect Moon Powder, interact with environment, upgrade you fireworks and many more! And all this with the fireworks!

Firework Apprentice is a 3D adventure puzzle game set in fantastic world of floating islands with destructible environment. Each island has new, unique challenge for Apprentice, that can be accomplished using his fireworks (there are no repetitive stages).
But in order to build his rockets, Apprentice must collect "Moon Powder" - a secret ingredient of all his fireworks!

FEATURES:

** CHOOSE CONTROL TYPE **
Choose control scheme that fits best for You: touch to move or directional pad.
Controls explained in interactive tutorial.

** TRAVEL TO UNIQUE LOCATIONS **
Explore 12 levels of colorful floating islands: Swamps, Skyharbor, Emperor's trail, Firework's Workshop and more - each island has unique, destructible environment and new objective! Use your firework on every location to solve puzzles and help funny characters.
New levels coming soon!

** COLLECT MOON POWDER **
Moon Powder is a secret ingredient of all Apprentice's fireworks. It can be hidden everywhere: under stones, in bushes, in wooden crates, on a merchant's wagon, under old wooden bridge... Have an eyes wide open and do not hesitate to use fireworks in order to find new supply of magic powder!
Moon Powder is primarily used to upgrade Your rocket's explosion power and radius.

** CARTOON DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENT **
Control the power of explosion!
The whole difficulty of firing fireworks is to use appropriate force: too much power and you can do more damage than good! Remember: firework explosion force affects all environment elements.

** STUNNING CARTOON 3D GRAPHICS **
Graphics powered by Unity3D engine with optimized realtime shadows. Each island has unique, colorful environment.

** ACCOMPLISH MORE THAN TWENTY ACHIEVEMENTS **
